name: Armada.net
title: .NET utilities to integrate with Armada Platform
description: This library contains utilities helpful during development of Armada based microservices derived from 'microservice_dotnet' image. Most basic usage scenario is method of accessing configuration delivered via Hermes by using Armada.Hermes class.

packOptions.summary: This library contains utilities helpful during development of Armada based microservices derived from 'microservice_dotnet' image.
